translations.All general settings to modify Duplicate: All general settings to modify Duplicate Finder behaviors.
translations.When true, files mounted on external sto: When true, files mounted on external storage will be ignored.
translations.When true, the event-based detection wil: When true, the event-based detection will be disabled.
translations.The interval in seconds between database: The interval in seconds between database cleanup operations. This job only maintains the database and does not delete any files from your storage. It helps keep the app running smoothly by removing outdated database entries.
translations.The interval in seconds for the find dup: The interval in seconds for the find duplicates background job.
translations.These settings are for advanced users on: These settings are for advanced users only. If you are not sure what you are doing, please do not change them.
translations.Duplicates search initiated (this may ta: Duplicates search initiated (this may take a while)
translations.Preview and delete multiple duplicates a: Preview and delete multiple duplicates at once while preserving files in protected folders.
translations.Total files to delete: {count}, Space th: Total files to delete: {count}, Space that will be freed: {size}
translations.No duplicate files were found that can b: No duplicate files were found that can be deleted. This could be because there are no duplicates, or all duplicates are in protected folders.
translations.Are you sure you want to delete all sele: Are you sure you want to delete all selected duplicates? This action cannot be undone.
translations.Welcome, the current duplicate has {numb: Welcome, the current duplicate has {numberOfFiles} files, total size: {formattedSize}
translations.No duplicates found or no duplicate sele: No duplicates found or no duplicate selected.
translations.This action will delete all instances of: This action will delete all instances of the selected files. Are you sure you want to proceed?
translations.Configure folders that should be exclude: Configure folders that should be excluded from duplicate scanning. Files in these folders (and subfolders) will be ignored during duplicate detection.
translations.Configure folders that should be conside: Configure folders that should be considered as origin folders. Files in these folders will never be marked as duplicates to be deleted.
translations.This folder is already an origin folder: This folder is already an origin folder
translations.Duplicate Finder is a Nextcloud app that: Duplicate Finder is a Nextcloud app that helps you find and manage duplicate files in your cloud storage. It automatically scans your files and identifies duplicates based on their content.
translations.The app uses file content hashing to ide: The app uses file content hashing to identify duplicates. This means files with identical content are detected as duplicates, regardless of their names or locations.
translations.How can I protect important files from d: How can I protect important files from deletion?
translations.Use the Origin Folders feature in settin: Use the Origin Folders feature in settings. Files in these folders will never be marked as duplicates for deletion, ensuring your original files are always protected.
translations.Can I exclude certain folders from scann: Can I exclude certain folders from scanning?
translations.Yes, you can exclude folders in two ways:
Yes, you can exclude folders in two ways:
1. Add them to Excluded Folders in settings
2. Place a .nodupefinder file in any folder you want to exclude
translations.Yes, all files deleted through Duplicate: Yes, all files deleted through Duplicate Finder can be recovered from your Nextcloud trash bin during the retention period set by your administrator.
translations.The app is designed to minimize performa: The app is designed to minimize performance impact. It uses background jobs and can be configured to ignore mounted files. You can also adjust scanning intervals in settings.
translations.The app maintains a small database of fi: The app maintains a small database of file hashes. The storage impact is minimal and scales efficiently with your file count.
translations.How do I report issues or suggest featur: How do I report issues or suggest features?
translations.You can report issues and suggest featur: You can report issues and suggest features through our GitHub Issues page.
translations.Can I contribute to the project?: Can I contribute to the project?
translations.Yes! The project is open source under th: Yes! The project is open source under the AGPL license. Visit our GitHub repository to contribute.
translations.There are three main ways to detect dupl: There are three main ways to detect duplicate files in your Nextcloud:
translations.Automatically scans for duplicates when: Automatically scans for duplicates when files are uploaded or modified
translations.Can be disabled in settings if needed: Can be disabled in settings if needed
translations.Set how often the system should scan for: Set how often the system should scan for duplicates
translations.Runs automatically based on your configu: Runs automatically based on your configured interval
translations.Once duplicates are detected, you have s: Once duplicates are detected, you have several options to manage them:
translations.View duplicates in Unacknowledged and Ac: View duplicates in Unacknowledged and Acknowledged sections
translations.Compare file details and select which co: Compare file details and select which copies to delete
translations.Mark duplicates as acknowledged for bett: Mark duplicates as acknowledged for better organization
translations.Recover deleted files from trash if need: Recover deleted files from trash if needed
translations.Use Bulk Delete to handle multiple dupli: Use Bulk Delete to handle multiple duplicates at once
translations.Filter and select duplicates based on va: Filter and select duplicates based on various criteria
translations.Efficiently manage large numbers of dupl: Efficiently manage large numbers of duplicates
translations.Configure the app behavior through these: Configure the app behaviour through these advanced settings:
translations.Turn off automatic scanning on file chan: Turn off automatic scanning on file changes
translations.You can now start managing your duplicat: You can now start managing your duplicate files. Access settings anytime for more options.
translations.Help us make Duplicate Finder even bette: Help us make Duplicate Finder even better!
translations.Show your support by starring the projec: Show your support by starring the project
translations.Help us improve by sharing your ideas: Help us improve by sharing your ideas
translations.This guide will help you get started wit: This guide will help you get started with finding and managing duplicate files.
translations.Cannot delete file as it is in an origin: Cannot delete file as it is in an origin folder

Some folders could not be saved:

translations.Failed to add folder to excluded folders: Failed to add folder to excluded folders
